snippet.title: Mr. Maze teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Mr. Maze is a cheap & cheerful 3D adventure game by Mark J. Lovegrove.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/853310/Mr_Maze/

Apologies that the footage is low quality but keep an eye out for an official high quality release trailer!

Mr. Maze is the 2nd game by MJ Lovegrove (after Dumbass Drivers!) utilizing the Unity engine, as we concentrate on developing adventure games in-house.
